trans-unit.source: During the manufacturing process there are circumstances that lead to certain parts within a BOM not meeting the desired requirements. This can be, for example, a generator that does not provide enough power or a bicycle chain that cannot be used for a model because it is not working.

seg-source.mrk: During the manufacturing process there are circumstances that lead to certain parts within a BOM not meeting the desired requirements.
This can be, for example, a generator that does not provide enough power or a bicycle chain that cannot be used for a model because it is not working.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, a change must be made during manufacturing.

seg-source.mrk: In such a case, a change must be made during manufacturing.

trans-unit.source: Open the production order in which the assembly is affected. Then choose Functions > Create Eng. Change Notice on the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Open the production order in which the assembly is affected.
Change Notice on the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: : Create an Eng. Change Notice from a Production Order

seg-source.mrk: Change Notice from a Production Order

trans-unit.source: The General and Comments FastTabs are described below. The Source Drawing Set and Source Document FastTabs only show which current drawing is affected and from which production order this change notice was created.

seg-source.mrk: The General and Comments FastTabs are described below.
The Source Drawing Set and Source Document FastTabs only show which current drawing is affected and from which production order this change notice was created.

trans-unit.source: The General FastTab shows the most important information about a change notice at a glance.

seg-source.mrk: The General FastTab shows the most important information about a change notice at a glance.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason for the change notice.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the reason for the change notice.

trans-unit.source: Basic description that defaults from the Change Reason Code.

seg-source.mrk: Basic description that defaults from the Change Reason Code.

trans-unit.source: Number of the item affected from the production order.

seg-source.mrk: Number of the item affected from the production order.

trans-unit.source: Description of the item affected in the production order.

seg-source.mrk: Description of the item affected in the production order.

trans-unit.source: Shows whether a comment exists in the area Eng. Change Notice BOM lines or not. This is independent of the number of comments. As soon as a comment exists, “Yes” is displayed. The BOM of the originating document is always copied to the change notice.

seg-source.mrk: Shows whether a comment exists in the area Eng.
Change Notice BOM lines or not.
This is independent of the number of comments.
As soon as a comment exists, “Yes” is displayed.
The BOM of the originating document is always copied to the change notice.

trans-unit.source: The drawing number does not have to be that of the item. The user can select any drawing here.

seg-source.mrk: The drawing number does not have to be that of the item.
The user can select any drawing here.

trans-unit.source: Date of creation of data record.

seg-source.mrk: Date of creation of data record.

trans-unit.source: User ID from user list, which has created the data record.

seg-source.mrk: User ID from user list, which has created the data record.

trans-unit.source: In the Comments FastTab, add information to a change notice.

seg-source.mrk: In the Comments FastTab, add information to a change notice.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Text field to describe the problem or reason why an item needs to be changed, at maximum 80 characters.

seg-source.mrk: Text field to describe the problem or reason why an item needs to be changed, at maximum 80 characters.

trans-unit.source: Date on which the comment was entered.

seg-source.mrk: Date on which the comment was entered.

trans-unit.source: User ID from the user list that is to make the change and must approve it.

seg-source.mrk: User ID from the user list that is to make the change and must approve it.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to delete or change lines only with your own User ID. The lines of other users cannot be edited.

seg-source.mrk: It is possible to delete or change lines only with your own User ID.
The lines of other users cannot be edited.

trans-unit.source: Various functions are available on the Home or Actions tab for editing change notices.

seg-source.mrk: Various functions are available on the Home or Actions tab for editing change notices.

trans-unit.source: After the relevant information has been entered in the change notice, the BOM Lines of the Eng. Change Notice can be opened on the Home or Actions tab using the BOM button.

seg-source.mrk: After the relevant information has been entered in the change notice, the BOM Lines of the Eng.
Change Notice can be opened on the Home or Actions tab using the BOM button.

trans-unit.source: : Eng. Change Notice, BOM Lines with Comment

seg-source.mrk: Change Notice, BOM Lines with Comment

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Eng. Change Notice BOM Lines page are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: Change Notice BOM Lines page are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: The type of data record to be addressed, e.g. Item.

seg-source.mrk: The type of data record to be addressed, e.g. Item.

trans-unit.source: The number of the record that is affected, depending on the type, e.g. item number.

seg-source.mrk: The number of the record that is affected, depending on the type, e.g. item number.

trans-unit.source: The quantity affected by the change.

seg-source.mrk: The quantity affected by the change.

trans-unit.source: Field for the change reason, specification of the type of material or assembly affected.

seg-source.mrk: Field for the change reason, specification of the type of material or assembly affected.

trans-unit.source: As soon as all information has been entered on the card and anchored in the BOM lines of the Eng. change notice, the responsible person must choose Send on the Home or Actions tab in the Eng. change notice. The status changes to Pending Approval.

seg-source.mrk: As soon as all information has been entered on the card and anchored in the BOM lines of the Eng.
change notice, the responsible person must choose Send on the Home or Actions tab in the Eng.
The status changes to Pending Approval.

trans-unit.source: The change notice now appears in the “Pending Approval” Activities of the Eng. Change Notices.

seg-source.mrk: The change notice now appears in the “Pending Approval” Activities of the Eng.

trans-unit.source: During the processing, change notices can have the following statuses:

seg-source.mrk: During the processing, change notices can have the following statuses:

trans-unit.source: On Hold – If a change notice has been sent, the responsible engineer can set the status to Wait. This means that he or she accepts the change notice but will not process it until a later date.

seg-source.mrk: On Hold – If a change notice has been sent, the responsible engineer can set the status to Wait.
This means that he or she accepts the change notice but will not process it until a later date.

trans-unit.source: Approved – If a change notice has been sent, the responsible engineer can set the status to Approved. This means that he or she accepts the change notice.

seg-source.mrk: Approved – If a change notice has been sent, the responsible engineer can set the status to Approved.
This means that he or she accepts the change notice.

trans-unit.source: Rejected – If a change notice has been sent, the responsible engineer can set the status.

seg-source.mrk: Rejected – If a change notice has been sent, the responsible engineer can set the status.

trans-unit.source: This function opens the item card of the relevant item.

seg-source.mrk: This function opens the item card of the relevant item.

trans-unit.source: This function opens the source document of the change notice.

seg-source.mrk: This function opens the source document of the change notice.
